It's a cute sweatshirt. The letters are cheap, but it'ok for the price. It's pretty thin and oversized. It's comfy.

I had this on my wish list for Christmas. I needed a sweatshirt in this color and this was about all I could find. I’m 5’9 long torso and busty. This top was too short and wider than I’d like. I also don’t think the material is very nice, it felt cheap to me. For the price there are better options. The color was spot on, I ordered the light green.
very comfortable
I’ve worn this a million times already. The letters need to be steamed. Which I haven’t done. Haha. They look a little cheapy, but it’s still cute and trendy. Good oversized comfy fit.
I wanted to love this but returning, very cheaply made. Disappointed

评论概述: As pictured but color not exact
评论详情: This is a thick quality sweatshirt which I love, however the color is more peachy than vanilla.

评论概述: Good material and quality but words appear iron on
评论详情: Sweater looks great. Feels great. Letters seem poor in quality. Like iron on.
My daughter wanted a baggy sweatshirt that said Paris on it. She absolutely loves this one! Inside is very soft and it washes well. Very happy with this purchase.
Great, comfortable oversized sweater. Really like the fit. Lent it to my brother on a cold night and it worked. Definitely recommend.
Very cheaply made and not comfy. Don’t even bother. The sweatshirt wouldn’t last more than a couple washes.
The quality of the hoodie is amazing. Very comfy. It fits really nicely. The thickness keep you warm. You will love it!
Super cute sweatshirt for springtime. Very oversized,  so consider that when ordering.
Perfect fit and color! For all the insta girlies out there being inspired to be cozy and look cute this is the perfect sweatshirt. With shorts, leggings, or jeans its been a hit

Comfy fabric, good price
The return label doesn’t appear to be a real one. Lots of writing in Chinese and you have to pay for postage. The color was more of a yellow gold than a taupe.
As a lover of all things Paris, I bought this for myself for my birthday. I’m a small but sized up to large for an oversized fit. It’s was shipped very fast and is very comfortable!
Love my new sweet shirt is very soft and comfortable thankbyouv
Perfect weight....not extremely heavy but cozy.  I'm very happy with it.

Very warm, quality sweatshirt. The only thing I don't love is that the bottom is definitely tighter than the more flowy fit in the photo. Would have liked it to hang straight down as pictured. Points off for that.
Fit perfectly. Casual and over sized. Nice fabric. Wish it came in more patterns and colors
I bought this and it is made well. It is a bit oversized but I like having my sweatshirts a bit loose. I normally wear an XL but could have fit in a size L in this item. Great to wear with jeans!
This sweater is great quality it's just a little too oversize for me. Great customer service!!
I really like the quality of this sweatshirt for the price. It is soft and has a nice feel. It definitely runs big. I bought a medium and it fits more like a large. But I like the oversized fit.

评论概述: Way too HUGE - but high quality
评论详情: I’m usually a size small and I knew this sweatshirt would be oversized on purpose, so I just got a small. And I must say it is definitely oversized, at least a XXXL, it was triple my body width and the height was fine. The design is amazing, colors good and quality ACTUALLY REALLY GOOD. I just wish it wasn’t THAT oversized and just a normal oversized fit, not extreme.
Granddaughter loved this very roomy. She’s 14. Happy with the purchase.

My wife wanted to see how good it was, specially since it had many great reviews. The fabric has a great feel and great quality, The sweatshirt looks great and fits how my wife wanted it and made her really happy. You know what the saying says,  happy wife, happy life.
I love it. It’s cute and comfortable. It was also affordable.

This sweatshirt was labeled oversized but that was a serious understatement. The small would fit my son, who is 5’ 10” and weighs 175 pounds. Plus, I have to pay for the return to China, costing $300. No thank you.
I absolutely love the look and feel of this sweatshirt. It’s oversized so it looks great with leggings.
I bought this for my granddaughter. She loves it

Order with caution; HUGE differences in quality! I originally ordered this sweatshirt in a different color, but when it arrived, the color was way off from the photos and didn’t look good at all. I started a return so I could purchase in a different color, and the seller immediately refunded me and provided excellent customer service. I reordered the sweatshirt in black, and when it arrived, it was completely different from the first shirt. Way too short and wide, made of thin, rough material, and the collar was sewn incorrectly so it stands up weird in the back and looks awful. It is unwearable. The first shirt was thick and soft and perfectly sized, just the wrong color. I don’t want to deal with another return request so I’m just taking the loss and won’t be ordering from this seller again.
I was pleased with the way this shirt was made. Nice thickness to it.  Not cheap and thin.  Very soft and looks great after a wash.
Perfect for a simple sweatshirt

Good sweatshirt. Very nice and warm. Unfortunately I probably got one with some defect, the neck seems is a bit wide and wont stay flat. But too much work to return and wanted for an outfit the day it arrived.
Did not like the quality of the material. Feels more like nylon than a cotton material.
It doesn’t look like the picture!!! This one went back the minute I opened the parcel. It looks cheap and tacky.
The quality very cheap.All polyester.Also size large looks junior.Not easy return may loose money on the return.
Ordered a medium,  it’s more a kids medium

I am very dissatisfied with this item. The fabric is terrible it is not cotton. It feels like a sponge and it could catch fire or melt if I am near an open flame.  I know it was only $23 but not worth it.

BEWARE…some of these sweatshirts that were shipped were NOT as the item described!  I received a poor quality and not oversized relaxed fit at all…  one of the amazon influencers shared hers and it was a great fit (oversized) and was as described. I think when they sell so many(if popular) They send whatever they want to fill the order!  BUYER BEWARE!  I was very disappointed.  (I purchased both white and black and both were the same - had to return)

This was awful. It was not oversized at all was way to small, undersized! Colour was not as described. Terrible quality material. Cheap “Paris” logo was in black not white as described. Just a terrible top! I don’t think it was worthy of any stars but I had to put something to complete survey
The sweatshirt that arrived was NOT oversized, in fact, not even true to size.  2-3 sizes smaller. Misleading the customer. Purchased an XL and it fits like a womens Medium or Small.
Too small going to return
Disappointed got a L but it fits more like a M!! What a waste of $$
